content: nora s fish in 2006 i wanted to make my niece nora a stuffed fish reminiscent of the works of dr seuss i couldn t find a suitable pattern online so i designed my first pattern the limerick was included in the birthday card which accompanied the gift yarn a few yards of green worsted for fish body scraps of black worsted for eyes scraps of rainbow yarn for fins novelty yarn is suitable recommended hook size f hook or hook slightly smaller than recommended for yarn for body notions fiberfill stuffing darning needle directions note unless noted differently do not join rounds or turn just mark the first stitch with a stitch marker or safety pin moving the marker as you start the next round to increase -make 2 stitches in a single stitch to half_double_crochet two stitches together
